name: 灭顶之灾（crowning calamity)
description:
crowning calamity to
Multiplayer Cooperative PVE
Up to 4 players per game
Players can stop the attack of the corpse tide by setting traps, collecting resources, and building defensive content.
Every time a period of time will open the next scene
The game content of each level is different, but the plot is connected

There are 4 free characters in the game, you can choose together
Play to everyone's strengths


Gather resources and build defenses
Complete in-game missions

Infection variation pattern

The system automatically selects a player to become infected.
Infected people can assimilate mercenaries to win.
When the time is over, mercenaries can survive and win.
